scripts.deploy: npm run build && 7z a -r demo-dapp-server.zip dist node_modules package.json package-lock.json tsconfig.json lambda.js
scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name demo-dapp-server --runtime nodejs16.x --role arn:aws:iam::052146137548:role/lambda-execution-role --zip-file fileb://demo-dapp-server.zip --handler dist/lambda.handler
scripts.update: npm run deploy && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name demo-dapp-server --zip-file fileb://demo-dapp-server.zip
scripts.deploy:ec2: npm run build && scp -i src/private/demo-dapp-server.pem -r dist .env package.json ec2-user@ec2-54-226-64-208.compute-1.amazonaws.com:/home/ec2-user/minting_site_server
